backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, blob storage mixins, user and artist profiles, lyrics, voice notes, song snippets, and messaging data structures and CRUD ops.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing audio upload validation improvements and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for build planning and reference.
frontend/docs/publish.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps for publishing the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/docs/pwa-installability-validat: Checklist for validating PWA installability on iOS Safari and Android Chrome with sign-off fields.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH color variables and base theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry defining PWA manifest, iOS meta tags, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining name, colors, icons, and PWA display settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, mobile shell, and profile setup modal.
Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper requiring authentication and showing a sign‑in prompt or fallback when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile app layout with header, main content, and bottom navigation that highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileF: Profile editing form handling display name, bio, genres, and social links with validation and dynamic genre management.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for first‑time profile setup that submits minimal profile data and displays success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallCtaBu: Button that triggers PWA installation or navigates to help when install prompt isn't available.
frontend/src/components/share/CopyLinkBu: Button that copies the current page URL to clipboard with fallback behavior and visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Hook detecting PWA install availability and status, exposing an install function with event handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, artist, lyric, and messaging data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/lib/rhyme/rhymeEngine.ts: Implements a simple rhyme-suggestion function matching word endings against a predefined list.
frontend/src/lib/rhyme/wordlist.en.ts: Exports a large array of common English words used for rhyme matching.
frontend/src/lib/templates/songTemplates: Defines several song structure templates with names, descriptions, and predefined section layouts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays an artist's profile, social links, and song snippets with navigation and messaging actions.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Renders a message thread with a participant, handles sending messages, and stores recent conversations.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Shows a hero banner, search bar, and placeholder UI for future artist discovery features.
frontend/src/pages/HelpInstallPage.tsx: Displays installation instructions for iOS and Android with step-by-step UI and feature imagery.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Shows recent message participants from local storage and navigates to conversation threads or displays an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/LyricEditorPage.tsx: Provides a full lyric editor with create/update/delete, tags, templates, and rhyme suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/LyricsLibraryPage.tsx: Lists and filters the user's saved lyrics with search, tags, and navigation to individual lyric editing.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile details and uploading song snippets with validation, genres, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceNotesPage.tsx: Allows recording, previewing, and saving short voice notes with duration limits and storage integration.
frontend/src/utils/audioFileValidation.t: Provides audio file validation using MIME type and extension fallbacks, plus a helper for generating the audio accept attribute.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature status, and requirements for supporting broad audio file uploads.
